channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: AMD unveils new Threadripper CPUs and Radeon GPUs for gamers at Computex 2025
item.description: AMD held a Computex press event to introduce its Radeon RX 9060 XT graphics cards and Threadripper CPUs for next-gen gaming and workstations.

item.title: 4 cases when a Roth conversion won’t pay off for you
item.description: Sometimes moving money to a Roth IRA just doesn’t make sense.

item.title: My brother’s ‘good daughter’ siphoned $70,000 from her father’s accounts. Should she still get an inheritance?
item.description: “He has a large old house, valued at about $170,000, and many valuable antiques. I will be the executor of his estate.”

item.title: Automate 2025: 5 ways cobots and AMRs top humanoid robots

item.title: How good will your retirement be? Depends on where you live.
item.description: Policymakers are trying to close the gap between the best and worst places to retire

item.title: Everyday investors keep making Wall Street pros look dumb with this one simple move
item.description: ‘It was a no brainer’ for retail traders, but professional market participants have missed the trade

item.title: New crypto bill could turbocharge the stablecoin industry: 4 changes it might bring
item.description: Legislation regulating stablecoins, a type of cryptocurrency whose value is pegged to another asset, is set for a vote in the Senate.

item.title: Inside Google’s AI leap: Gemini 2.5 thinks deeper, speaks smarter and codes faster
item.description: Google is moving closer to its goal of autonomous agentic AI with a series of enhancements to Gemini 2.5 Pro and Flash.
